text: Àwọn àgbààgbà t’ó ṣègbéraga nínú ìjọ rẹ̀ wí fún àwọn tí wọ́n fojú tínrín, (ìyẹn) àwọn t’ó gbàgbọ́ lódodo nínú wọn, pé: "Ǹjẹ́ ẹ mọ̀ pé dájúdájú Sọ̄lih ni Òjíṣẹ́ láti ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa rẹ̀?" Wọ́n sọ pé: “Dájúdájú àwa gbàgbọ́ nínú ohun tí Wọ́n fi rán an níṣẹ́.”
